name: Martin's Escape
description:
Hello, this game is a joke to my brother. I always want to play with him table tennis and he usually says no because he is studying. And recently I told him to play a game, "Breand and Fred", but he didn't want and after that he was on holidays with friends in other country. I did this game about it, and there is "Fideos" and "Escarvadientes" because I always hide that kind of things in his own objects, like in his bed or laptop. The fight system is not the best, I didn't want to spend to much time in this joke, but I think that is well.

You can skip the cinematic of playing table tennis when you are beatten by the boss with the right arrow.

Thanks for playing and have a good day! :)
